metadata.title: CVE-2024-33655 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
Unbound could be used to take part in a DoS attack

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-33655` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunbound8 - 1.17.1-2ubuntu0.2
python3-unbound - 1.17.1-2ubuntu0.2
unbound - 1.17.1-2ubuntu0.2
unbound-anchor - 1.17.1-2ubuntu0.2
unbound-host - 1.17.1-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unbound package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.17.1-2ubuntu0.2').
